title: slow loading web pages & others websites won't sigin in
content:
1. some webpages extremely slow loading while others are fine. All load fine on Chrome. Why? Particularly true with https://www.tab.com.au/ that I use 2-3 times a week. In Chrome it's immediate connect.

2. cannot sign in to my members account on (eg) Choice but easy on Chrome. Why?

Love Firefox when it works but I'm getting so frustrated. Seriously considering going back to Chrome - reluctantly.

Also so many website/page freezes & non responses over last ~3 months. Grrrr
creator: jv8

title: Canadian English has Missing Definitions
content:
I was excited to see that Firefox had support for Canadian English, however the dictionary seems to be missing numerous words and I get spelling errors for words like "lasagna."

Is this a bug or is the dictionary just barely populated with words and missing a tremendous amount?
creator: gerrit.j.kat

title: Remove left side bar
content: I recently upgraded to the latest version 132.0.2. There's a vertical sidebar on my browser that I would like to remove. I looked into the customize sidebar settings but can't seem to find a way to remove it completely. I've also attached a screenshot. Any guidance would be appreciated. Thanks!
creator: andrewkcomt

title: Pop Up ?
content: What is this window called? When this window started popping up a couple of months ago, I noticed a couple of odd things happening on a website I go to. It would not let me pay them. It would look like it was going to then a white screen would pop up ans say" if you see this window then you ...........". I then have to pay on the phone or chrome. I have whitelisted the site but still does it.
creator: miso1

title: Lost Access to Spectrum Email Using Firefox Browser
content:
I am no longer able to log into my Spectrum email using Firefox as my browser. I can login using Chrome. Firefox worked fine until I tried logging in on November 21 and then I ended up in a loop. I can access other parts of Spectrum, just can't get to mail. I have it set up to transfer to Outlook and than works fine. Spectrum says there is nothing they can do about it.

Has anyone else had this experience? If so, were you able to resolve it?
creator: joycehawkins
